For today, B&H Photo has the SmallRig CT-10 Aluminum Travel Tripod with Ball Head on sale for $44.90, saving you $25.

SmallRig CT-10 Aluminum Travel Tripod with Ball Head

  • Load Capacity: 33 lb
  • Working Height Range: 16.9 to 70.9″
  • Folded Length: 16.9″
  • Ball Head with Arca-Type QR
  • 4-Section Aluminum Legs, Flip Locks
  • Removable Leg Converts to Monopod
  • Three 1/4″-20 Accessory Threads
  • Weight: 3.37 lb
  • Includes Smartphone Holder
  • Includes Carrying Case

The CT-10 Aluminum Travel Tripod with Ball Head from SmallRig is a compact and versatile tripod designed for content creators shooting video, live streams, still photography and more. It offers a maximum height of 70.9″, folds to a compact 16.9″, and can support up to 33 pounds of camera equipment. Each tripod leg mount features a 1/4″-20 threaded accessory mount for attaching a monitor, a microphone, an extension arm, an LED light, or other devices as needed. The 360° rotating metal ball head has an Arca-type quick release plate, and has adjustable friction to help balance the mounted camera. A smartphone holder is included for live streaming and short video vlogging.

The tripod can be easily turned into a monopod, when using a tripod may be too cumbersome or slow, as when shooting sports or wildlife. The center column is removable and pairs with a removable leg to form a 71.7″ tall monopod with a convenient wrist strap.
